TopicTitle: I finally got around to making a rendition of the iconic intro song

Articles.Content:
I like it. It's a bit over-embellished and flashy but its strong and riveting. But I am biased.

Let me know what you think

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/kerbal-space-program-intro-jatwaaified

Thanks

Billy
Lovely. Were you inspired by any particular composers?
Jeremy Soule and 2 Steps From Hell mostly. Game music is all I listen to these days

In case you prefer Youtube, I posted it there as well

Enjoy
Amazing job. I applaud you. I loved the extra drums and trumpet sounds!
Thanks peeps! I am glad you all like it. I tried not to go overboard...but ended up just going full throttle.

Thanks Thomas!

I think I may try some tweaks or may try Morrowind's intro next unless I start another project. Let me know if you all like any others on my Soundcloud!

Thanks again peeps!
This is the greatest theme song-ing of all time.

Thanks! I made a few minor tweaks to the song. Mostly to spruce up the ending a bit more and and more pronounced rolls for the non-drums. It's finally to a point to where I can stop picking apart my own work lol!

Let me know if you hear, like, hate the changes.

Thanks - J
